name: IndiaFacts
0:
”Alexa, start indiafacts”
”Alexa, launch indiafacts”
”Alexa open indiafacts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: india facts
des:
"India is, the cradle of the human race, the birthplace of human speech, the mother of history, the grandmother of legend, and the great grandmother of tradition. Our most valuable and most instructive materials in the history of man are treasured up in India only."

These are not our words. These are the words of the great Mark Twain.



This skill tells some of the interesting and unheard facts about the great diversity-INDIA.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
